entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 5:59AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Winds Over The Eastern Arctic Coast Thursday Night And Friday... West winds gusting to 50 mph are expected over the Eastern Arctic Coast Thursday night into Friday. Blowing snow with reduced visibility is expected, with blizzard conditions possible. This will affect the coast from Point Thompson east.
